text: The Women's sprint competition at the 2017 World Championships was held on 13 and 14 April 2017. ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The top four riders advanced directly to the 1/8 finals; places 5 to 28 advanced to the 1/16 final. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
